properties.title: Modern Apartment in City Center
properties.description: A modern apartment located in the heart of the city. Close to all amenities and public transportation.

properties.title: Spacious Family Home with Garden
properties.description: A spacious family home with a large garden, perfect for kids and pets. Quiet neighborhood with good schools nearby.

properties.title: Luxury Penthouse with Stunning Views
properties.description: A luxurious penthouse offering breathtaking views of the city skyline. High-end finishes and amenities.
